description: A humorous tale of a chocolate's romantic adventure in Italy.
title: Sweet Inclinations
n_1: In the charming streets of Pisa, Carlo seeks a romantic spot.
c1_1: Ah, Bella Pisa! Where art thou perfect spot?
n_2: Carlo spots the Leaning Tower, standing tall and askew.
c1_2: Ecco! The Leaning Tower, sweet and inclined, just like me!
c2_2: Oh Carlo, you and your sweet talk!
n_3: Gina watches amused as Carlo admires the tower.
c1_3: Gina, would you be my Valentine at this beautiful tower?
c2_3: Only if you promise to stay sweet, Carlo!
n_4: Together, they enjoy a romantic evening by the tower.
c1_4: To us, sweet and forever inclined!
c2_4: To our uniquely Italian love story, Carlo!
